title: LF Sub ADC Sub Mid OOL/R5s Team D5+
body:
Im a coach/manager for this team we have a high standard of player we would like to give and opportunity for people to fill in for a prime roster this will require u to train/trail with us and be available at least 5 days a week please note we will have a very strick code and judge how u play even if it is your first with us so when u join a trail try only your best and make sure u are adopted the meta

Add Beefybill to join and ask more question if needed
